title: Elementary Science Inquiry Projects Utilizing Augmented Reality (AR)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Environment enabling smartphone-based AR content utilization, with emphasis on collaborative learning for project completion

learning_goals: AR tools can be used to visualize the plant growth process in 3D and explain key stages
Learners can develop the technical ability to add AR layers (measurements/annotations) to field observation data captured via smartphones
Science inquiry results can be compiled into an AR portfolio and incorporate peer evaluation feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
